rows.label: qst710301_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, aspirant youths! Stay
RIGHT where you are.

rows.label: qst710301_msg0002
rows.name:
You have a look about you that
tells me you might be interested
in my most marvelous inventions!

rows.label: qst710301_msg0003
rows.name:
Here, look! I've hundreds of the
things! Beauties, aren't they?

rows.label: qst710301_msg0004
rows.name:
Superbia has absolutely nothing
on my masterworks, I tell you!

rows.label: qst710301_msg0005
rows.name:
I am, nevertheless, at somewhat
of a loss as to how to surpass
my former genius.

rows.label: qst710301_msg0006
rows.name:
What with the war on the horizon,
it's been getting more and more
difficult to find the parts I need...

rows.label: qst710301_msg0007
rows.name:
So now I've laid my woes bare. Could
you perchance help the great Gennai
collect some machine parts?

rows.label: qst710301_msg0008
rows.name:
I believe the ones lying around here
in Iira should be choice enough!
